Breadth-First.Explanation: Broad clue collection without a specific hypothesis, cataloging all visible objects for general orientation

Confirming Frankfurt via PWC signage, ‘Hauptbhf’ text, tram tracks and skyline features

Depth-First.Explanation: Focusing on specific landmark buildings to establish viewpoint

Depth-First.Explanation: Using virtual street view to match relative positions and eliminate alternatives
Depth-First.KeyElement: Relative positions of Tower 185, Commerzbank Tower, train-track curve, junction

Depth-First.Explanation: Stating and confirming the precise location and neighborhood
Refining the answer format to include city, country, and continent explicitly
Final convergence on the area south of Hauptbahnhof with detailed view alignment

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shifted from broad observation to targeted verification of a Frankfurt hypothesis via text analysis
